channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Palantir falls 12% as analysts raise international growth concerns
item.description: Palantir fell more than 10% even after the company hiked its guidance as AI demand fueled revenue growth.

item.title: Doordash announces $1.2 billion SevenRooms deal, misses revenue expectations
item.description: Doordash on Tuesday announced the $1.2 billion acquisition of restaurant booking platform SevenRooms and reported first-quarter earnings.

item.title: Luxury carmaker Ferrari warns of U.S. tariff risks after 17% jump in first-quarter profit
item.description: Luxury carmaker Ferrari on Tuesday reported a significant upswing in first-quarter profit, citing robust demand for personalized vehicles.

item.title: Palantir shares fall as company reports in-line earnings, lifts full-year guidance
item.description: Palantir boosted its guidance for the year on Monday, as net income in the latest quarter more than doubled.

item.title: Ford suspends 2025 guidance amid $2.5 billion tariff impact
item.description: Ford Motor beat Wall Street's first-quarter expectations, but suspended its 2025 financial guidance amid an expected $2.5 billion impact this year fro...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.
